Name: For Dev & Testing - Evan Currier - Application Portal Form

ApplicationTable.Name: Child Application
ApplicationTable.Description: This table represents the template "child" application table for all child application tables created through the Application Builder. Fields, forms, views, and more will be included by default for all newly created child tables through the Application Builder publishing process.

FundingOpportunityApplicationTable.Name: Child Application
FundingOpportunityApplicationTable.Description: This table represents the template "child" application table for all child application tables created through the Application Builder. Fields, forms, views, and more will be included by default for all newly created child tables through the Application Builder publishing process.

Actions.Name: Review - Field Input - Project Name (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Test
Properties.Description: A brief, descriptive title of the legal entity's project associated with the award application or award. This comes from the Federal Integrated Business Framework (FIBF) model.

Actions.Name: Initial Step - Field Input - Alternate Application ID (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Single Line of Text
Properties.Description: A unique number assigned by state (as opposed to Federal) review agencies to the Federal award during the grant application process. This SAI number is unique at the state level. This comes from the Federal Integrated Business Framework (FIBF) model.

Actions.Name: Initial Step 123 - Field Input - Areas Impacted (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Multi Line Text Custom Display Name
Properties.Description: A list of geographic areas or entities aided within the function or activity for a Federal award using categories specified in the Federal agency instructions (e.g., Cities, Counties, States). This comes from the Federal Integrated Business Framework (FIBF) model.

Actions.Name: Initial Step 123 - Field Input - Allow Appeal? (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Yes / No
Properties.Description: The indication of whether the applicant should be allowed to submit an appeal for this application.

Actions.Name: Initial Step 123 - Field Input - Award Type (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Award Type
Properties.Description: Award Type Custom Descriptionâ€¦..

Actions.Name: Initial Step - Field Input - Revision Type(s) (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Revision Type(s)
Properties.Description: The type of revision that defines the change to the financial obligation and/or contingent liability that needs to occur on an application. This is only required to be specified if the type of application submitted is a revision.

Actions.Name: Initial Step 123 - Field Input - Denial Reason (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Denial Reason
Properties.Description: The reason for denial of the application.

Actions.Name: Initial Step 123 - Field Input - Approved Cost Share or Match (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Currency
Properties.Description: An amount of approved cost sharing or matching, where applicable. This comes from the Federal Integrated Business Framework (FIBF) model.

Actions.Name: Initial Step - Field Input - Approved Indirect Cost Rate (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Decimal
Properties.Description: The approved percentage for the indirect cost rate based on the calculation of the "Total Approved Indirect Budget" over the "Total Approved Direct Budget".

Actions.Name: Initial Step - Field Input - Application Score (Child Application)

Properties.Label: Whole Number
Properties.Description: The calculated score for the application to help assist in determining whether it should be approved or denied.
